entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
